title: Environment Is Node.js
description: In this lab, we will explore the functionality of Node.js and learn how to determine if our code is running within a Node.js environment. By using the process global object, we can check if our code is being executed within a Node.js runtime environment and perform specific actions accordingly. This lab will provide hands-on experience with Node.js and deepen your understanding of its capabilities.

meta.title: Exploring Node.js Environment
meta.description: Learn how to determine if your code is running in a Node.js environment using the process global object.
meta.keywords: javascript, process object, node js, javascript practice, javascript practice online, javascript lab, runtime environment, javascript tutor, programming

verify.name: Verify Node Commands Executed
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
